Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Requires vehicle rental agreements instruct renters to remove personal information before returning the vehicle and permits rental vehicles to have decals informing the renter to remove such information
Summary: Requires vehicle rental agreements instruct renters to remove personal information before returning the vehicle; permits rental vehicles to have decals informing the renter to remove such information when returning the vehicle.
LawCode: Amd ยง396-z, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to personal information being removed from rental vehicles
